name: SleepSoundsAnimals
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sounds animals
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Sounds Animals lets you reproduce relaxing audio tracks about nature and animals. This skill will calm you and make you feel better.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill. 
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines. 
Click + to add a new routine. 
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one. 
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills". 
Choose "Your Skills". 
Select this skill. 
Click Next. 
Choose Device to perform the routine to. 
Click Save. 

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
